name: Git Annotation Tag
description: Add a git annotation tag during the build process.
author: Ray Lomax
helpMarkDown: Add a git annotation tag during the build process.

inputs.name: ProjectRef
inputs.label: This is the name of your visual studio instance

inputs.name: AccessToken
inputs.label: This is the personal access token.
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the personal access token, obtained from the user settings menu option.

inputs.name: SystemDefinitionId
inputs.label: This is the System.Definition.Id predefined variable

inputs.name: BuildRepositoryName
inputs.label: This is the Build.Repository.Name predefined variable

inputs.name: BuildSourceBranchName
inputs.label: This is the Build.SourceBranchName predefined variable

inputs.name: TagItem
inputs.label: The tag item value
inputs.helpMarkDown: This variable represents the visible tag from within the commited section of your git repository, normally a version but can be anuthing. i.e. 1.0.0

inputs.name: TagMessage
inputs.label: Description of the tag item.
inputs.helpMarkDown: This variable represents the message you wish to accompany the tag item variable which is more likely to be a description of the tag item. i.e. First release of our great software.
